traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: The crawler can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

traits.name: Flawless Tracker
traits.desc: The crawler can track down any creature it has smelled in the last 24 hours unless that creature's location is concealed through magical means.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Befuddling Screech (1/Day)
actions.desc: The crawler lets out an ear piercing screech in a 30-foot cone that reverberates in frequencies that cause the minds of most creatures to become scrambled. Each creature in this cone must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 5 (1d10) psychic damage and lose its sense of time and direction for 1 hour.
